allow: Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "N:\\must-harn\\gemini-image-gen.ps1" -Prompt "A similar inflatable product but in blue color, same style and lighting" -ReferenceImage "N:\\must-harn\\inflatable.png" -OutputPath "N:\\must-harn\\test-reference-output.png")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& ''N:\\must-harn\\gemini-image-gen.ps1'' -Prompt ''A simple blue ball on white background'' -OutputPath ''N:\\must-harn\\test-basic.png'' -ApiKey ''AIzaSyB80HmKZJmehZWV5W-Pfe9tmRsM1NogTTI''")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& ''N:\\must-harn\\gemini-image-gen.ps1'' -Prompt ''Same product but in blue color, maintain same style and lighting'' -ReferenceImage ''N:\\must-harn\\test-basic.png'' -OutputPath ''N:\\must-harn\\test-reference-output.png'' -ApiKey ''AIzaSyB80HmKZJmehZWV5W-Pfe9tmRsM1NogTTI''")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
# Quick test - generate just 2 images for one product
$ApiKey = ''AIzaSyB80HmKZJmehZWV5W-Pfe9tmRsM1NogTTI''
$OutputDir = ''N:\\must-harn\\images\\products''

# Generate first image
Write-Host ''Generating test-product-1...'' -ForegroundColor Cyan
& ''N:\\must-harn\\gemini-image-gen.ps1'' -Prompt ''A simple red cube on white background, product photography'' -ApiKey $ApiKey -OutputPath \(Join-Path $OutputDir ''test-product-1.png''\)

# Generate second image with reference
Write-Host ''Generating test-product-2 with reference...'' -ForegroundColor Cyan
& ''N:\\must-harn\\gemini-image-gen.ps1'' -Prompt ''Same cube from a different angle, side view'' -ReferenceImage \(Join-Path $OutputDir ''test-product-1.png''\) -ApiKey $ApiKey -OutputPath \(Join-Path $OutputDir ''test-product-2.png''\)

Write-Host ''Done!'' -ForegroundColor Green
")
